Paul Emordi (amụrụ 25 Disemba 1965) bụ onye na-eme egwuregwu Naịjirịa lara ezumike nka bụ onye gbara na asọmpi ogologo mwụli elu na mwụli atọ
Ọkacha mma nkeonwe ya na ogologo mwuli elu bụ 8.25 mita, ọ nwetara na June 1987 na Baton Rouge
Nke a mere ya ọkwa nke atọ n'ime ndị na-agba ogologo mwuli elu Naijiria, naanị n'azụ Yusuf Alli (8.27 m) na Charlton Ehizuelen (8.26 n'ime ụlọ)
Àtụ:Footer All-Africa Champions Long Jump Men
